title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 444.19 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 444.19 - Exceptions

State Regulations

Exceptions to the provisions of this Part, other than
statutory requirements, may be approved by OCFS if requested by the Agency in
writing and upon determination by OCFS that such exception is (a) in the best
interests of the child, (b) is consistent with the health, safety and welfare
of the child, and (c) the child's parent have provided written consent if able
and applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
444.19

Adopted

New

York State Register December 8, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 49, eff. 12/8/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
